{{Stub}}

'''Joel Skousen''' is an [[anti-Communist]] commentator and author and frequent guest on InfoWars.

Joel is the son of [[W Cleon Skousen|W. Cleon Skousen]], who was known for promoting far-right conspiracy theories and anti-Communist views. Cleon Skousen was a prominent figure in the [[John Birch Society]], although he was never officially a member. Joel Skousen largely continues his father's views and work, and often trades on the name recognition.
